title: physics
description: Rigid body physics properties for a node

collisionShape.description: The shape a physics simulation should use to represent the node

mass.description: The 'weight', irrespective of gravity, of the node

static.description: The Node should not be moved by physics simulations

bounding_box.description: The local bounding box dimensions of the node

radius.description: Radius to use for calculating the physics shape based on bounding box of the node

height.description: Height to use for calculating the physics shape based on bounding box of the node

height_axis.description: The axis (0=X, 1=Y, 2=Z) to use for the height of the node

mesh.description: The ID of the mesh to use for CONVEX_HULL and MESH collision shapes

offset_matrix.description: A 4x4 transform matrix applied to the physics shape in addition to the node's transform

offset_rotation.description: A rotation offset (as a quaternion) applied to the physics shape in addition to the node's rotation

offset_scale.description: A non-uniform scale offset applied to the physics shape in addition to the node's scale

offset_translation.description: A translation offset applied to the physics shape in addition to the node's translation
